snippet: Two residents of Spain’s North African enclave of Melilla are accused of having links to terrorists and membership in the Islamic State group.
abstract: Turkish officials arrest Ahmed Debza and Nadia Ataich Fernandez, couple from Melilla, Spain, on suspicion they have ties to Islamic State terrorists.
lead_paragraph: Two residents of Spain’s North African enclave of Melilla are accused of having links to terrorists and membership in the Islamic State group.

headline.main: Spain: Couple Accused of Links to ISIS
headline.print_headline: Europe; Spain: Couple Accused of Links to ISIS

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
